import { Container ,FormControl,Grid,Paper,Button, Avatar,Fab} from "@mui/material" import React ,{useState} from "react" import { appIcon, nameIcon, passwordIcon } from "../../Constant/Icon/icon" import { InputElement } from "../../Template/FECommon" export function LoginLayout(){ const [loginDetails,setLoginDetails]=useState({ userName:"", password:"" }) const handleInput=(event)=>{ setLoginDetails({ [event.target.id]:event.target.value }) } const {userName,password}=loginDetails return (

Login your account



 ) }
